title: California Protected Areas Database (CPAD) & Conservation Easement Database (CCED) 2025b
description: Comprehensive spatial data on California's protected lands and conservation easements. CPAD inventories over 50 million acres across 16,000+ parks and protected areas owned by 1,200+ public agencies and nonprofits. CCED inventories 3+ million acres across 3,800+ conservation easements held by 180+ agencies and nonprofits. Available in cloud-optimized formats: GeoParquet, PMTiles, and H3 hexagonal tilings (resolution 10, partitioned by h0). CPAD provides three geographic levels: HOLDINGS (individual parcels), UNITS (aggregations within counties), and SUPER UNITS (dissolved across county boundaries). All data includes GAP conservation status codes (1-4) based on USGS GAP Analysis Program. CCED lands are predominantly closed to public access as conservation easements are on primarily private lands with legal restrictions on development. Access levels include: Open Access (public use), Restricted (permits/limited hours), and No Public Access. Best used at scales above 1:24,000.

providers.name: GreenInfo Network
providers.description: Develops CPAD and CCED databases with support from California Natural Resources Agency, California Strategic Growth Council, USGS Gap Analysis Program, and Department of Water Resources

gap_status_codes: GAP 1: Managed for biodiversity, disturbance events proceed
GAP 2: Managed for biodiversity, disturbance suppressed
GAP 3: Multiple uses including extraction or OHV
GAP 4: No known mandate for protection

table:columns.name: HOLDING_ID
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each parcel (CPAD Holdings only)

table:columns.name: UNIT_ID
table:columns.description: ID linking holding to parent unit

table:columns.name: SUID_NMA
table:columns.description: Super unit ID for cross-county aggregation

table:columns.name: UNIT_NAME
table:columns.description: Name of the park or protected area unit

table:columns.name: PARK_NAME
table:columns.description: Name of the park (Super Units only)

table:columns.name: AGNCY_NAME
table:columns.description: Full name of the owning agency

table:columns.name: AGNCY_LEV
table:columns.description: Jurisdiction level: City, County, Special District, Joint, State, Federal, Non Profit, Private

table:columns.name: AGNCY_TYP
table:columns.description: Detailed agency type (e.g., State Agency, Non Profit - Land Trust, Recreation/Parks District)

table:columns.name: MNG_AGNCY
table:columns.description: Managing agency if different from owner

table:columns.name: MNG_AGENCY
table:columns.description: Managing agency name (Super Units)

table:columns.name: MNG_AG_LEV
table:columns.description: Managing agency jurisdiction level (Super Units)

table:columns.name: MNG_AG_TYP
table:columns.description: Detailed managing agency type (Super Units)

table:columns.name: ACCESS_TYP
table:columns.description: Public access level: Open Access, Restricted, No Public Access

table:columns.name: LAND_WATER
table:columns.description: Whether holding is land or water (Holdings only)

table:columns.name: COUNTY
table:columns.description: County containing the holding

table:columns.name: CITY
table:columns.description: City containing the holding (if applicable)

table:columns.name: ACRES
table:columns.description: Acreage calculated by GIS

table:columns.name: SPEC_USE
table:columns.description: Special uses: Cemetery, Golf Course, School JUA, Trail Corridor, Wildlife Sanctuary, etc. (Holdings only)

table:columns.name: YR_PROTECT
table:columns.description: Year parcel was acquired (Holdings only)

table:columns.name: YR_EST
table:columns.description: Year the park/unit was established

table:columns.name: GAP1_acres
table:columns.description: Acres managed for biodiversity where disturbance events proceed or are mimicked

table:columns.name: GAP2_acres
table:columns.description: Acres managed for biodiversity where disturbance events are suppressed

table:columns.name: GAP3_acres
table:columns.description: Acres managed for multiple uses including extraction (mining, logging) or OHV use

table:columns.name: GAP4_acres
table:columns.description: Acres with no known mandate for protection

table:columns.name: GAP_tot_ac
table:columns.description: Sum of all GAP acres

table:columns.name: GAP_Source
table:columns.description: Source of GAP data: USGS PAD-US, CDPR, or managing agency

table:columns.name: e_hold_id
table:columns.description: Unique easement record ID (CCED only)

table:columns.name: sitename
table:columns.description: Site name as reported by agency (CCED only)

table:columns.name: ease_label
table:columns.description: Generic label 'Conservation Easement' for mapping (CCED only)

table:columns.name: esmthldr
table:columns.description: Primary easement holder agency name (CCED only)

table:columns.name: eholdtyp
table:columns.description: Holder type: federal, state, local, NGO, other (CCED only)

table:columns.name: s_emthd1
table:columns.description: Any additional easement holders (CCED only)

table:columns.name: e_type
table:columns.description: Main purpose of easement (CCED only, under development)

table:columns.name: pubaccess
table:columns.description: Access status: closed, restricted, or open - almost all are closed (CCED only)

table:columns.name: duration
table:columns.description: Permanent or term-limited if 10+ years (CCED only)

table:columns.name: term
table:columns.description: Numeric term length if applicable (CCED only)

table:columns.name: date_est
table:columns.description: Full date established MM/DD/YYYY (CCED only)

table:columns.name: year_est
table:columns.description: Year established YYYY (CCED only)

table:columns.name: gis_acres
table:columns.description: Acres calculated by GIS (CCED only)

table:columns.name: TOT_GAP_AC
table:columns.description: Sum of GAP acres (CCED only)

table:columns.name: iucncat
table:columns.description: IUCN management category: Ia, Ib, II, III, IV, V, VI, N/A (CCED only)

table:columns.name: h10
table:columns.description: H3 hexagon cell ID at resolution 10 (~15,000 mÂ² per hex)

table:columns.name: h9
table:columns.description: Parent H3 hexagon at resolution 9

table:columns.name: h8
table:columns.description: Parent H3 hexagon at resolution 8

table:columns.name: h0
table:columns.description: H3 resolution 0 cell ID (partition key for efficient spatial queries)

cpad-holdings-parquet.title: CPAD Holdings (Parcel-level) - GeoParquet
cpad-holdings-parquet.description: Individual parcels of protected land - most detailed level for analysis. Includes all core fields, GAP status, agency info, and access levels.

cpad-holdings-pmtiles.title: CPAD Holdings - PMTiles
cpad-holdings-pmtiles.description: Vector tiles for web mapping with progressive loading.

cpad-holdings-hex.title: CPAD Holdings - H3 Hexagonal Tiling (Resolution 10)
cpad-holdings-hex.description: Hierarchical hexagonal grid partitioned by H3 resolution 0 (h0) cell. Includes parent resolutions h0, h8, h9 for aggregation. Path: h0={cell}/data_0.parquet

cpad-units-parquet.title: CPAD Units (Named holdings within counties) - GeoParquet
cpad-units-parquet.description: Aggregations of holdings with common name, access level, and managing agency within each county. Fewer fields than holdings.

cpad-units-hex.title: CPAD Units - H3 Hexagonal Tiling (Resolution 10)
cpad-units-hex.description: Partitioned by H3 level 0 cell (h0). Path: h0={cell}/data_0.parquet

cced-parquet.title: CCED Conservation Easements - GeoParquet
cced-parquet.description: Conservation easements on primarily private lands with legal restrictions on development. Predominantly closed to public access.

cced-hex.title: CCED - H3 Hexagonal Tiling (Resolution 10)
cced-hex.description: Partitioned by H3 level 0 cell (h0). Path: h0={cell}/data_0.parquet

readme.title: README - Full Data Documentation
readme.description: Comprehensive documentation including all field descriptions, example SQL queries, data quality notes, and usage guidelines.
